0.1.name: wordpress/revised-meta-tag
0.1.description:
The meta 'revised' tag is used to make available the last modified date & time of a webpage to web crawlers.

Detailed information regarding 'revised' meta tag can be seen here.

Implementing 'revised' tag in WordPress posts and pages becomes very easy with this plugin, and you can see the tag added to your posts and pages just after installing it.

Features

  • Allows you to add Revised date meta tag in your posts and pages, you can also opt-in and out this functionality for posts and page separately.
  • Provides a controlled display of last modified / last updated date above or below your posts and pages. You may choose from four different date formats, the position of the timestamp (above/below), you can customize the verb to be displayed with the modified date (i.e. "Last updated" in place of "Last modified").

Support
